story:
Milestone Architecture PLLC is collaborating with Pratt in Venice and is co-curating the exhibit with Patriarcato di Venezia. Our firm is a dynamic, young, global architectural and design practice, based in New York and with representatives in India, Italy, and Turkey. Our mission statement expresses our firm’s spirit and dedication.

Milestone’s mission is to create environmentally conscious architectural design that meets the needs and enhances the lives of people around the world. At the same time, we strive to preserve the timeless legacy of architecture and design through the restoration of classical and historical buildings.

In the spirit of the planners of Venice, our project, Dimensions: Two Venetian Scole, aims to utilize cutting edge architectural survey technology in an effort to conserve the current state of vital landmarks in the city’s built environment. Using 3D laser-scanning, extremely accurate images of the structures including Scola de Cristo & Scola dei Merchant, will be captured, refined and made public.

By doing so, we will elaborate the historical aspects of the artworks and structures, as well as aim to reconstruct the original artworks and functions present in the buildings. In addition, we will exhibit contemporary digital art (which is shown here in our video) in the historic structure as a reminder of the timeless and fluid nature of culture. 

The project also acts as means of giving agency to the local population to catalyze future conservation and artistic projects at their discretion.

Venetian culture, heretofore, has been nearly invisible within the significant cultural event of the Venice Biennale. If the Venetian community is enabled to participate as a constituent, rather than as spectator, in the Venice Biennale of Architecture 2018, it would give visibility to the tremendous efforts of the Venetian community to save besieged Venetian culture. There are architectural and structural challenges confronting the scole sites that are inherent to the well-documented risks imperiling Venice, including lack of financial resources, competing interests, fractured governance, native depopulation, and environmental hazards.

In 2014, Milestone Architecture PLLC worked on Torcello, an island in the Venetian lagoon, drawing attention to its importance as a global heritage site. We recently published a book, entitled Restoration Initiative: Torcello-Venezia, Italia, about Torcello's history and our architectural survey process. Using 3D digital laser-scanning technology, we were able to report extremely accurate images of the structures, including the seventh-century Basilica of Santa Maria Assunta, the twelfth-century Martyrium of Santa Fosca and the Campanile.

A key feature of our Torcello project was its "human-centered design", its accessibility for youth, the elderly, and the disabled. Working with an accomplished team of researchers, we developed methods for elevating the tactile nature of exhibit elements, in order to increase the way in which we could inform and educate exhibit visitor.

·       Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word. Share our cause with your friends and colleagues!

Visit the exhibition website : https://dimension-twovenetianscole.org/
story_txt: Milestone Architecture PLLC is collaborating with Pratt in Venice and is co-curating the exhibit with Patriarcato di Venezia. Our firm is a dynamic, young, global architectural and design practice, based in New York and with representatives in India, Italy, and Turkey. Our mission statement expresses our firm’s spirit and dedication.Milestone’s mission is to create environmentally conscious architectural design that meets the needs and enhances the lives of people around the world. At the same time, we strive to preserve the timeless legacy of architecture and design through the restoration of classical and historical buildings.In the spirit of the planners of Venice, our project, Dimensions: Two Venetian Scole, aims to utilize cutting edge architectural survey technology in an effort to conserve the current state of vital landmarks in the city’s built environment. Using 3D laser-scanning, extremely accurate images of the structures including Scola de Cristo & Scola dei Merchant, will be captured, refined and made public.By doing so, we will elaborate the historical aspects of the artworks and structures, as well as aim to reconstruct the original artworks and functions present in the buildings. In addition, we will exhibit contemporary digital art (which is shown here in our video) in the historic structure as a reminder of the timeless and fluid nature of culture. The project also acts as means of giving agency to the local population to catalyze future conservation and artistic projects at their discretion.Venetian culture, heretofore, has been nearly invisible within the significant cultural event of the Venice Biennale. If the Venetian community is enabled to participate as a constituent, rather than as spectator, in the Venice Biennale of Architecture 2018, it would give visibility to the tremendous efforts of the Venetian community to save besieged Venetian culture. There are architectural and structural challenges confronting the scole sites that are inherent to the well-documented risks imperiling Venice, including lack of financial resources, competing interests, fractured governance, native depopulation, and environmental hazards.In 2014, Milestone Architecture PLLC worked on Torcello, an island in the Venetian lagoon, drawing attention to its importance as a global heritage site. We recently published a book, entitled Restoration Initiative: Torcello-Venezia, Italia, about Torcello's history and our architectural survey process. Using 3D digital laser-scanning technology, we were able to report extremely accurate images of the structures, including the seventh-century Basilica of Santa Maria Assunta, the twelfth-century Martyrium of Santa Fosca and the Campanile.A key feature of our Torcello project was its "human-centered design", its accessibility for youth, the elderly, and the disabled. Working with an accomplished team of researchers, we developed methods for elevating the tactile nature of exhibit elements, in order to increase the way in which we could inform and educate exhibit visitor.·       Other Ways You Can HelpHelp us spread the word. Share our cause with your friends and colleagues!Visit the exhibition website : https://dimension-twovenetianscole.org/

story:
ENGLISH UPDATE

A propos du film / About the Film

French: La France Cachée est une série de documentaires qui met en avant les communautés peu représentées en France. La première partie présente la communauté noire de France à travers une riche palette d’acteurs de différentes origines, religions et milieux sociaux. 

English: La France Cachée (The Hidden France) is a docuseries that empower underrepresented communities in France. The first part presents the black community of France through a rich palette of actors from different origins, religions and social backgrounds.

first part video_screenshot / capture d'écran de la première partie

Qu'est ce qui a poussé le réalisateur à faire ce projet / What prompted the director to create this project:      

French: Je suis arrivé sur Paris en décembre 2015 après avoir passé sept ans et demi en Asie du Sud. J’ai été très content de voir la diversité en France comparée au manque de mixité en Asie. J'ai ensuite remarqué le manque de représentation des personnes racisées dans les médias (magazines, télévision, publicités, etc…) 

Je ne comprenais pas ce décalage, surtout dans un grand pays cosmopolite comme la France. J’ai également eu le même sentiment lorsque j'ai visionné des émissions et des films français. Très peu de personnes racisées obtiennent des premiers rôles. 

English: I arrived in Paris in December 2015 after seven years and half in South Asia. I was immediately very happy to see the diversity in France compared to the lack of diversity in Asia. Just few months later I began to see the lack of representation of people of color in the media (magazines, television, advertising, etc ...) I did not understand this shift especially in a large cosmopolitan country like France. I also had the same feeling when I watched French programs and films, very few people of color were given leading roles.

first part video_screenshot / capture d'écran de la première partie

Ce que nous avons accompli jusqu'à présent/ What we've achieved so far: 

French: La première partie est une vidéo qui présente plus de 85 talents en studio. Elle à été entièrement autofinancée par le réalisateur Christin Bela cela comprend: la production et la post production ( location du matériel, location studio de tournage) l’organisation de plus de cinq projections en France (projection privée, festivals, salle de cinéma) l’organisation des projections à l’étranger (Canada, Londres) .Visibilité dans les médias écrits, télévisés et radios

English: The first part is an introductory video that presents more than 85 participants in  studio. It was entirely self-financed by the director Christin Bela it includes: production and post production (equipment rental, film studio rental) the organization of more than five screenings in France (private screening, festivals, movie theater) the organization of several screenings abroad (Canada, London, Cambodia) Visibility in print, television and radio media

Press écrite: Nouvel L'obs 

Afropunk

 

first part making off / making off première partie 

 

France 24 English, TV5 Monde French, France 24 French

 

   Previous screenings / Projections precedentes

 

Ce que nous voulons faire / What we want to do now:

French: 

  • Continuer à présenter les talents présents dans la vidéo avec des portraits individuels . 
  • Rencontrer de nouveaux profils non présents dans la première partie. 
  • Organiser un événement inter-communautaire pour permettre un échange culturel entre les communautés.

English: 

  • Continue to present talents in the film with individual video portraits.  
  • Meet new profiles not present in the first part.
  • Organize an intercommunity event to allow cultural exchange between communities.

 

Pourquoi devriez-vous soutenir ce projet / Why people should support the project:

French: A son arrivée en France, sur Paris, les retrouvailles avec ses racines, sa culture et sa communauté ont joué pour beaucoup dans le processus de création de La France Cachée. Beaucoup de questions dont certaines encore aujourd’hui n’ont pas trouvés réponses, ont poussées Christin Bela à comprendre pourquoi.  

Pourquoi, la société française n’est pas représentative de ce qu’elle est réellement. 

A travers la réalisation complète de ce projet, nous voulons:

  • Déconstruire les préjugés qui existent entre certains groupes d’individus en France. 
  • Unifier et permettre un échange inter-communautaire afin de construire un meilleur vivre ensemble pour nous et nos générations futures. 
  • Que chacun se réapproprie de sa narration afin de mieux partager son vécu, son passé et pour célébrer ses origines. 

"La double culture est une richesse qui ne fait pas partie de l’idéologie sociétale française. Si elle était beaucoup plus représentée, le racisme, l’islamophobie, l’antisémitisme, la xénophobie et tous les autres sujets qui crispent la société française seraient moins présents".

Vivre dans un monde utopique n’existe pas mais il est possible de créer une société qui accepte et célèbre la différence.

Nous avons créé une série de documentaires, car ces sujets sont souvent abordés à l’écrit par des médias mais pas souvent en video. Or, selon les études, le téléspectateur moyen se souvient de 95% d'un message lorsqu'il est regardé, alors que seulement 10% de celui-ci est lu. Notre but est de casser les préjugés et d’inspirer les générations futures à s’ouvrir aux autres.

________________________________________________________________________________________

English: Upon his arrival in France, in Paris, his reconnection with his roots, his culture and his community played a lot in the process of creating La France Cachée.    Many questions, some of which still have not been answered, prompted Christin Bela to understand why.  Why, French society is not representative of what it really is.   

 

If we can fully get this project completed we want to:  

  • Break the prejudices that exist between certain groups of individuals in France. 
  • Unify and allow an intercommunity exchange to build a better life together and our future generations. 
  • Allow each group to reappropriate their own narration and share their experiences, because only them can do it better.

Double culture is a wealth that is not part of the French society ideology. If it were much more represented, racism, Islamophobia, anti-Semitism, xenophobia and all the other subjects that tense French society would be less present.

Living in a utopian world does not exist but it is possible to live in a society that celebrate our differences. 

We initiated these docuseries because these type of subjects are often written in newspaper or online medias but not often in video. According to studies, the average viewer remembers 95% of a message when viewed, while only 10% of it is read. Our goal is to break prejudices and to inspire future generations to be more open with one another.

Château rouge _ paris. Photo credit Christin Bela

 

Capture d'écran _ portrait  /  Screenshot shot _ portrait 

BUDGET

Your contributions will go toward three key parts: 

  1. Production (Filming, editing, color grading, sound mixing) + equipment rental.
  2. Travel cost: We are moving around 10 different cities in France.
  3. Build a brand new website. 

Vos contributions iront vers trois parties clés:

  1. Production (tournage, montage, étalonnage, mixage sonore) + location d'équipement.
  2. Transport + repas + Hotel : se déplacer dans 10 différentes villes en France.
  3. Construire un nouveau site internet.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

“If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way” Napoleon Hill

French: La réalisation de films est un art pas une science exacte. Les principaux défis seront la planification, la gestion du temps, l’argent. Essayez de programmer 40 personnes vivant dans différentes villes pendant 30 jours! Pas une tâche facile.

Tous ces jours nécessitent diverses configurations de caméra, des réarrangements de lumières, un enregistrement audio propre et le plus imprévisible "la météo" puisque nous filmerons entre l’automne et l’hiver.

Je travaille avec une petite équipe de professionnels talentueux pour m'aider à terminer le projet et je suis convaincu que tous les risques susceptibles d'être rencontrés seront atténués de manière appropriée et avec votre soutien. Nous savons que nous pourrons en faire une série de documentaires incroyables.

English: Filmmaking is an art not an exact science. The main challenges will be scheduling, time management, money. Try scheduling 40 people all living in different cities over 30 days! Not an easy task.

All of those days require various camera setups, light rearrangements, clean audio recording and the most unpredictable" the weather " since we will be filming  between autumn and winter. 

I am working with a small team of talented professionals to help me finish the docuseries and I am confident that any risks that might be encountered will be mitigated appropriately and with your support, we know we can make this an incredible docuseries.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

English: Money isn't everything. If you can't contribute, you can still spread the word!

Send us your ideas for people we should interview, or questions to ask the interviewees.Get on social media and tell your friends, family, co-workers, and random people you don't remember from high school

French: L'argent n'est pas tout. Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer, vous pouvez toujours en parler autour de vous!

Envoyez-nous vos idées pour les personnes que nous devrions interviewer ou les questions à poser aux personnes interrogées. Accédez aux médias sociaux et parlez-en à vos amis, à votre famille, à vos collègues et à des personnes au hasard que vous ne vous souvenez plus

REWARDS/CONTREPARTIES 

Every time you contribute, you receive something in return!

Chaque fois que vous contribuez, vous recevez quelque chose en retour!

Give €10 or more

English: Hello little rock star

This is big for us. 
Get a warm shout-out on all our social media platforms. 
. 
French: Bonjour petit(e) rock star 
Merci pour votre participation. 
Un remerciement sur toutes nos plateformes de réseaux sociaux.

 

Give €20 or more

Handwritten letter + Postcard + Pins

English:

  • A personalized handwritten letter written by Christin Bela
  • Two personalized postcards, with images of your choice. Write us which ones you prefer from the following selection: (https://bit.ly/2N3Uxoz)
  • La France Cachee Pins

French:

  • Une lettre manuscrite personnalisée écrite par Christin Bela
  • Deux cartes postales personnalisées, avec des images de votre choix. Dites-nous celle que vous préférez parmi la sélection suivante: (https://bit.ly/2N3Uxoz)
  • Un Pins La France Cachée

 

Give €35 or more: The DVD or USB

English: The Hidden France DVD or USB. 
You can't have both, pick one :) and send us your choice at: lafrancecachee@gmail.com
+ All previous rewards ( not included: Handwritten letter ) 
French: Le DVD ou USB de la France Cachée 
Vous ne pouvez pas avoir les deux, choisissez-en une :) et envoyez nous votre choix à lafrancecachee@gmail.com 
+ Toutes les contreparties précédentes ( non comprise: lettre manuscrite )

 

Give €45 or more: Limited edition T shirt + Tote bag

English:

  • One Special T shirt or sweat designed for indiegogo supporters
  • One Signed Tote Bag

+ All previous rewards ( not included: Handwritten letter ) 

French:

  • Un T-shirt ou sweat spécialement conçu uniquement pour les supporters de indiegogo
  • Un Tote Bag La France Cachée +

+ Toutes les contreparties précédentes ( non comprise: lettre manuscrite )

 

Give €50 or more: 2 Movie Tickets + 2 Poster

English: Two movie Tickets for our next screening all over the world + two invitation to the Film launching event in Paris + a2 limited edition A3 poster. 
+ All previous rewards ( not included: Handwritten letter, T shirt + Tote bags )

French: 

  • Deux billets de film lors de nos prochaines projections partout dans le monde 
  • Deux invitations à la soirée de lancement du film à Paris
  • Une affiche format A3 dédicacée en édition limitée.

+ Toutes les contreparties précédentes (non incluses: lettre manuscrite, t-shirt + tote bag)

 

Give €75 or more: Framed photograph

English: 30x45 Fine art photograph of Christin Bela's Travel photography work from Asia. Write us which ones you prefer from the following selection: https://bit.ly/2N3Uxoz send us your choice at: lafrancecachee@gmail.com

+ All previous rewards ( not included: Handwritten letter, T shirt + Tote bags )

French: Une photo encadrée 30x45 des photos de voyage d'asie de Christin Bela.
Dites-nous celle que vous préférez parmi la sélection suivante: https://bit.ly/2N3Uxoz envoyez nous votre choix à lafrancecachee@gmail.com

+ Toutes les contreparties précédentes (non incluses: lettre manuscrite, t-shirt + tote bag)

 

Give €150 or more: Best friend package

English:

  • 2 DVD or USB 
  • Special T shirt or sweat design for Indiegogo supporters only 
  • Signed Tote Bag La France Cachée 
  • 2 Signed Print of your choice 30x45. Write us which ones you prefer from the following selection: https://bit.ly/2N3Uxoz send us your choice at: lafrancecachee@gmail.com
  • A handwritten letter written by Christin Bela + surprise post card and above. 
  • Social media Shoutout with your picture. (send us your picture lafrancecachee@gmail.com)

Special thanks on our website and access to a protected link on our website of behind the scenes footage and photos. 
. 
French:

  • 2 DVD ou USB 
  • Un T-shirt ou sweat spécial uniquement pour les supporters de indiegogo. 
  • Tote bag La France Cachée 
  • 2 tirages photo signés de votre choix 30x45. Dites-nous celle que vous préférez parmi la sélection suivante: https://bit.ly/2N3Uxozenvoyez nous votre choix à lafrancecachee@gmail.com
  • Une lettre manuscrite écrite par Christin Bela + carte postale surprise. 
  • Un remerciement sur les réseaux sociaux avec votre photo. 

Un remerciement spécial sur notre site + l'accès sur notre site Web avec un lien privé des coulisses du tournage.

 

Give €350 or more for a Lifestyle Photoshoot for 2 persons

English:
Outdoor photo shoot with one person of your choice in Paris or Lyon. If you are overseas, anytime you visit France you can book your session with Christin Bela.

This is a full day session (8hours)

The photo shoot can also be organized with the photographer wherever you want in France or abroad. The cost of transport and accommodation will be at your expense.

Also includes: The Film DVD, PostCard, Social Media shot out with your picture + a special thanks on our website and access to a protected link of behind the scenes footage and photos. 

French:
Une séance photo en plein air avec une personne de votre choix à Paris ou Lyon. Si vous êtes à l'étranger, à n'importe quel moment où vous visitez la France vous pouvez réserver votre session avec Christin Bela.

C'est une session d'une journée (8 heures)

La séance photo peut également être organisée avec le photographe à l'endroit où vous le souhaitez en France, où à l'étranger. Les frais de transport et d'hébergement seront à votre charge .

Comprend également un DVD, une carte postale, un grand remerciement sur nos réseaux sociaux et sur notre site avec votre photo + l'accès à notre site Web avec un lien privé des coulisses du tournage.

 

Give €450 or more, get a Customized Professional Video

English:
Get a professional portrait video of you or your company. 
This is special price for my indiegogo supporters only. 

Condition: Whether you are based in France or abroad, the cost of transport and accommodation will be at your expense.

Also includes: The Film DVD, PostCard, Social Media shot out with your picture + a special thanks on our website and access to a protected link of behind the scenes footage and photos.
. 
. 
French:
Une vidéo professionnelle sur vous ou votre entreprise, une offre uniquement pour nos contributeurs(e) indiegogo. 

Condition: Que vous soyez basé en France ou à l'étranger, les frais de transport et d'hébergement seront à votre charge.

Comprend également un DVD, une carte postale, un grand remerciement sur nos réseaux sociaux et sur notre site avec votre photo + l'accès à notre site Web avec un lien privé des coulisses du tournage.

 

Give €900 or more be the Associate Producer

English:
You are a major force in getting this project made. You will be guaranteed a seat with cast & crew at any screening .

The associate producer credit which will be featured in the opening titles and posters and any promotional material involving the film.

Also includes: One DVD, one T shirt, One tote bag of the Film + Special thanks on our social media + our website with your photo + an access to a protected link on our website of behind the scenes footage and photos. 
. 
. 
French:
Vous êtes une force majeure dans la réalisation de ce projet. Grâce à votre contribution vous obtenez le rôle de producteur associé. Vous serez assuré d'avoir un siège avec l'ensemble de l'équipe à chaque projection.

Le crédit du producteur associé figurera dans les titres d’ouverture des vidéos, sur les affiches et tout matériel promotionnel impliquant le film. 

Comprend également un DVD, une carte postale, un grand remerciement sur nos réseaux sociaux et sur notre site avec votre photo + l'accès à notre site Web avec un lien privé des coulisses du tournage.

 

Give €2500 or more to become the big boss: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER 

English:

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER 

You are the big boss of the movie!

Because you are special, we offer you a personalized reward:

- Custom credit which will be featured in the opening titles and posters and any promotional material involving the film. 
- Your company logo on any promotional material involve in this film. 
- Portrait video of you, or a person of your choice 
- Lifetime VIP pass to all our screenings in France and abroad 
- Monthly Updates 
- Watch the Finished docuseries online before anyone 
- Special large fine art print of your choice, write us which ones you prefer from the following selection: (https://bit.ly/2N3Uxoz) 

French:

Le producteur délégué 
Vous êtes le big boss ! 
Parce que vous êtes spécial(e), on vous réserve des contrepartie personnalisées:

  •  Un crédit personnalisé qui figurera dans les titres d’ouverture et les affiches, ainsi que tout matériel promotionnel impliquant le film.
  • Le logo de votre entreprise sur tout matériel promotionnel impliqué dans ce film.
  • vidéo portrait de vous, ou une personne de votre choix
  • Pass VIP à vie pour toutes nos projections en France
  • Mises à jour mensuelles
  • Regardez le film en ligne avant tout le monde
  • Impression grand format spécial de votre choix, écrivez-nous ceux que vous préférez parmi la sélection suivante: (https://bit.ly/2N3Uxoz)

Our goal is to break prejudices and to inspire future generations to be more open with one another.

Château rouge _ paris. Photo credit Christin Bela
 
Capture d'écran _ portrait  /  Screenshot shot _ portrait 
BUDGET

Your contributions will go toward three key parts: 

Production (Filming, editing, color grading, sound mixing) + equipment rental.
Travel cost: We are moving around 10 different cities in France.
Build a brand new website. 

Vos contributions iront vers trois parties clés:

Production (tournage, montage, étalonnage, mixage sonore) + location d'équipement.
Transport + repas + Hotel : se déplacer dans 10 différentes villes en France.
Construire un nouveau site internet.

 

 
Risks & Challenges
“If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way” Napoleon Hill
French: La réalisation de films est un art pas une science exacte. Les principaux défis seront la planification, la gestion du temps, l’argent. Essayez de programmer 40 personnes vivant dans différentes villes pendant 30 jours! Pas une tâche facile.
Tous ces jours nécessitent diverses configurations de caméra, des réarrangements de lumières, un enregistrement audio propre et le plus imprévisible "la météo" puisque nous filmerons entre l’automne et l’hiver.
Je travaille avec une petite équipe de professionnels talentueux pour m'aider à terminer le projet et je suis convaincu que tous les risques susceptibles d'être rencontrés seront atténués de manière appropriée et avec votre soutien. Nous savons que nous pourrons en faire une série de documentaires incroyables.
English: Filmmaking is an art not an exact science. The main challenges will be scheduling, time management, money. Try scheduling 40 people all living in different cities over 30 days! Not an easy task. 
All of those days require various camera setups, light rearrangements, clean audio recording and the most unpredictable" the weather " since we will be filming  between autumn and winter. 
I am working with a small team of talented professionals to help me finish the docuseries and I am confident that any risks that might be encountered will be mitigated appropriately and with your support, we know we can make this an incredible docuseries.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
English: Money isn't everything. If you can't contribute, you can still spread the word!
Send us your ideas for people we should interview, or questions to ask the interviewees.Get on social media and tell your friends, family, co-workers, and random people you don't remember from high school
French: L'argent n'est pas tout. Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer, vous pouvez toujours en parler autour de vous!
Envoyez-nous vos idées pour les personnes que nous devrions interviewer ou les questions à poser aux personnes interrogées. Accédez aux médias sociaux et parlez-en à vos amis, à votre famille, à vos collègues et à des personnes au hasard que vous ne vous souvenez plus

REWARDS/CONTREPARTIES Every time you contribute, you receive something in return!Chaque fois que vous contribuez, vous recevez quelque chose en retour!Give €10 or moreEnglish: Hello little rock starThis is big for us. Get a warm shout-out on all our social media platforms. . French: Bonjour petit(e) rock star Merci pour votre participation. Un remerciement sur toutes nos plateformes de réseaux sociaux. Give €20 or moreHandwritten letter + Postcard + PinsEnglish: 
A personalized handwritten letter written by Christin Bela

story:
New Art space in Montevideo, Uruguay. 

The Cultural Center would be located in the heart of the Old Town in Montevideo. Designed to be a meeting point for artists; offering affordable workspaces, exhibitions, and performances.  

Our goal is to bring a unique place to Montevideo. Through our partnership with other art organizations in Buenos Aires and New York City, we will give artists an opportunity to share their work with the rest of the world. 

We will welcome any artist that wants to be part of enriching events or just wants to be part of the project. 

About the spaces:

 

 .            

 

Working spaces:

The idea is to offer affordable workspaces to artists. The spaces include a table with a chair, lights, easels, etc. All the artists will also have access to 3D printers; hand tools, laser cutter, wood or glass cutter, etc.

Gallery:

The gallery will be open for any artist that wants to show their work; Hosting solo shows, group shows, and performances. The gallery will also be available for rent by any artist not a part of the cultural center if scheduling corresponds with current exhibitions of members.

Community:

We want to give artists an opportunity to get involved in the cultural center; On the website, members will have a forum where they can find or post opportunities, post open calls, organize events, promote themselves or interact with other artists. 

*We are going to buy some tools from indiegogo projects so with your help you will be helping more people.

 

Who am i?

My name is Pablo Martínez. I am an Uruguayan visual artist recently arrived to Montevideo. For the last 4 years i been living in Chile and United States where i did a residency and some exhibitions in beautiful places. For that reason i decided to come back to Montevideo and create this Cultural Center.

                                                                         

                                                                      .   

 

Our funding plan:

We are looking to generate capital to open the space that is why we need to raise 20.000 dollars.

The fund will support:

- $9.000 To fix the building (It includes new access for people with disabilities, electrical of the building, washroom,etc.)

- $3.000 Furniture for workspace and gallery (tables, chairs, sofa, lights, etc.)

-$11.000 Available tools ( 3d printers, projectors, hand tools, drills, laser cutter,wood cutter, glass cutter, etc.)

 

Other ways to help.

Please, even if you can't donate, make sure to share this campaign with other people that want to collaborate or thought the social media. Remember; we are doing this because we know that we can do something big here!. 

 

Rewards:

* we will be adding more reward soon.

story:
Resumen

Somos un Coworking Space ubicado en la ciudad de Medellín. Brindamos un espacio a jóvenes profesionales independientes o emprendedores que requieran de un lugar para empezar sus proyectos y desarrollar sus pasiones. Nos gusta la cultura en todas sus formas y por eso en la terraza de nuestro tercer piso brindamos un espacio donde hemos invitado a diversos líderes de una amplia gama de sectores, pasando por el empresarial, el público y el artístico. Junto con el periódico digital Al Poniente, hemos traído diversas figuras en foros abiertos como lo son Claudia López, o Ivan Duque. 

Debido a que hemos contado con la fortuna de tener una gran asistencia a nuestros eventos, buscamos acomodar este espacio para poder atender una mayor cantidad de personas y enriquecer la agenda cultural de la ciudad. También buscamos no solo atender más personas  sino brindarles mayor comodidad en nuestras instalaciones.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

  • Mobiliario (sillas y mesas) para atender una capacidad máxima de 100 personas.
  • Optimizar la iluminación y la acústica del lugar. 
  • Un proyector o televisor, que sirva de apoyo audiovisual, para la exposición de conferencias o eventos.
  • Remodelar el suelo del espacio, pues en éste momento no es cómodo para los visitantes y la realización de eventos.
  • Requerimos de $1000 USD los cuales serán destinados $100 para el proyector, $200 USD inmobiliario, $200 USD para iluminación y acústica, y $500 USD para el piso.
  • Somos un Coworking space local, como recompensa te ofrecemos en caso de que seas de Medellín, o estés en la ciudad, un descuento especial en el uso de nuestros espacio, y una invitación a que compartas con nosotros y tomarnos una cerveza en  nuestra terraza para eventos, ¡que tu hiciste posible!
  • Todos nuestros fondos, independientemente de que logremos nuestra meta, irán destinados a la adecuación de nuestro espacio para eventos.

El impacto

  
  • Construiremos juntos un espacio para dinamizar la agenda cultural de la ciudad y la participación de las personas. 
  • Harás posible la creación de un espacio que será remodelado por artistas locales y apoyarás la divulgación del talento de Medellín.
  • La ciudad tendrá un nuevo espacio para la organización de eventos culturales y académicos, desde cursos de yoga hasta conferencias académicas.   
 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

  • Comparte en redes, tus conocidos pueden ser parte de la solución y tu también haciendo esto :)
  •  Escríbenos, danos ideas o propuestas si eres un artista o sabes de diseño de espacios.

story:
These are some of the Elders and Wisdom Keepers we are intending to bring, with your support to the Kiva 2018 - Our Website

 

Sweet Medicine - (Chickasaw/Choctaw/French/Irish)

 

Eustolio Rivera De la Cruz - (Mexico)
A Mara’akame​ from the Wixárica Yw’rata community

Sergio Torres López & Margarita Jiménez Orozco - (Mexico)

Tata Pedro Cruz - One of the last living members of the
Mayan Tz'utujil council of elders from lake Atitlan Guatemala.​

\

Nana Marina Cruz - Mayan healer from the Tz'utujil tribe.

Toroa Aperahama (New Zealand)
"Tena Koutou Katoa, nga mihi Aroha, A Maori greeting of Love to you all"

Grandmother Pilar Vergés 
Born in Catalonia, is coming to honour the land and represent Spain. 

The Blue Lions  
A band of Sikh warriors belonging to the ancient lineage
of the Warrior Akali Nihang Singhs.

Txana Ikakuru
Native Huni Kuin - Amazon, Brazil.


Tuwe Huni Kuin
Pajés Spiritual Leader - Novo Futuro Village,

Dani Shawãrakani - Amazon, Brazil
Sharing her knowledge of the Huni Kuin sacred feminine.

Jane Flood​ - UK
Story bringer from the land of Albion.

And more to come . . . .

story:
"We will always remember Horace Strong and his humor. I can see him pulling 50 paddles out of a box, one by one... and they each had a story. And his left handed pencils. Our world is a better place because of his work and commitment to allow those around him to be their best." 

-Martin and Julie McCrum

Campaign Summary

Sterling College invites its alumni and friends of Horace to raise $40,000 in 60 days towards tackling the $140,000 remaining renovations. The finished Rural Arts Center will honor Horace Strong, his craft, and his fifteen years at Sterling College.

Sterling College has a 60 year history of providing transformative education, preparing its students to be knowledgeable, skilled, and responsible environmental stewards.​

"Horace Strong, you are one of the greatest influences on my life!!"

-Helen Doyle '79

$174,000 down, $140,000 to go.

  • Thanks to a generous group of donors, the first $174,000 in renovations have been completed, including a $24,000 in-kind gift of woodworking tools and equipment.
  • The completion of the project requires an additional $140,000.
  • All funds raised will go towards renovations, in order of priority:
  1. Finish the outside of the building, complete the second-story classroom, and install the set of stairs to get students there!
  2. Purchase and install an explosion-proof fan, soundproofing windows, and doors for the woodworking space.
  3. Renovate the front classroom, dedicated to fine and fiber arts.
  4. Renovate the furnace room and replace the furnace with an efficient gas boiler.

Our goal is for the building to be completed by January 2019 with $40,000 needed more immediately to tackle time-sensitive aspects of the project. 

The Impact

Craftsbury Academy gifted their industrial arts building to Sterling College in 2017. Considering the growing needs of Paradise Hall, our former woodworking facility, the timing was impeccable. To ensure that Horace’s legacy endures, Sterling College is working to renovate the newly acquired building and rename it for Horace Strong--a space for Sterling students, the Academy's students, and members of the greater community with open-shop hours. 

The renovated space will be home to Sterling College's Environmental Humanities program where students will engage in the creative process to communicate, express their artistry, and effect change while exploring ways in which humanity engages with nature. We're prioritizing a space where students can explore what it means to transform a piece of ash into a canoe paddle, wool from the farm into yarn, local clay into pottery, plant pulp into paper, and ideas into poetry and prose. Ultimately, it means fully engaging with the natural world as we interpret, create, and share impressions and ideas with the broader community.

Horace was a man who found passion, friendship, and humor in our community; he was known for so many things, his commitment to his craft being one of them. This fundraising campaign is a way for you, the people that were so fond of Horace, to see that his commitment lives on. 

While all donations are much appreciated, those who can contribute $250 or more will receive a token of our appreciation. The larger the gift, the more perks you are eligible for. All donors at the $250 level or higher will receive a 9 - 11" tree cookie wood burned with your favorite Horace Strong quote -- here's a sampling:

  • Show me the person who never made a mistake and I’ll show you someone who never made anything.
  • As long as it’s perfect, it’s good enough.
  • The nice thing about wood and wood projects - they all will burn.
  • Never bleed on the work.
  • If at first you don’t succeed - blame Horace.
  • If at first you do succeed - try not to show your astonishment.
  • If you can't learn to do it well, learn to enjoy doing it badly.
  • Cheer up, it could be worse - I cheered up once and it got worse.
  • It’s good enough for who it’s for.
  • You are never a failure - you can always be used for a bad example.
  • A fool is always astonished by his early efforts.
  • Making a mistake is not a disgrace if you can make a new one every time.
  • One day reality will descend upon you like the warm sweet kiss of a sharp left hook.
  • It’s hard work working hard, ‘ent it?
  • If it weren't for the last minute, I wouldn't get anything done.
  • It's what you learn after you know it all that counts.
  • True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.
  • You can learn something new everyday if you don't know too much to start with.
  • Work a little, look a lot.
  • If all else fails, read directions. If that fails, follow them!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Peer to peer fundraising, like this campaign, rely on lots of sharing. There is no such thing as over-sharing a campaign. And while broad sharing is good, so is personally inviting your fellow Horace-fans to join you in supporting the effort.
